TopicTitle: What percentage of KSP users are on console vs computer?

Articles.Content: I'm curious about this.  The richness of the mod community leads me to believe the computer users are a big portion but what is the rough percentage?
Maybe a poll would help record the info? I for one started on console and then switched to computer.

I'm sure the developers have the actual raw numbers and breakdown, but I'd be hard pressed to think all consoles combined come anywhere near PC users. The game started on the PC, the PC gets stuff first, it's easier to mod and run mods on a PC and steam makes it easy to get the game. 

 

If I'm wrong and there are actually a lot of dedicated console players I'd be pretty amazed, and hope KSP 2 focuses on them a little more ;D

I wasn't aware this game was even on console. I never like purchasing cross-platform games, as they tend to giyp the PC users so they don't offend Phony and X-Boner. Just another reason I suppose I won't be moving to KSP"2" if it gets released.
